text: Mazatlania fulgurata is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Columbellidae, the dove snails. ==Description== The length of the shell varies between 8 mm and 23 mm. ==Distribution== This species occurs in the Caribbean Sea and in the Gulf of Mexico. ==References== * Rosenberg, G.; Moretzsohn, F.; García, E. F. (2009). Gastropoda (Mollusca) of the Gulf of Mexico, Pp. 579–699 in: Felder, D.L. and D.K. Camp (eds.), Gulf of Mexico–Origins, Waters, and Biota. Texas A&M; Press, College Station, Texas. ==External links== * Category:Columbellidae Category:Gastropods described in 1846
title: Mazatlania fulgurata
